txt_en: You have every right to a beautiful life.
txt_cn: 你值得拥有属于你的美丽人生。
author: Selena Gomez

txt_en: There is no friend as loyal as a book.
txt_cn: 好书如挚友，情谊永不渝。
author: 海明威

txt_en: They can because they think they can.
txt_cn: 他们可以，是因为他们相信自己可以。
author: Virgil

txt_en: I have found that if you love life, life will love you back.
txt_cn: 我发现，如果你爱生活，生活也会用爱来回报你。
author: Arthur Rubinstein

txt_en: Forgiveness does not change the past, but it does enlarge the future.
txt_cn: 宽恕无法改变过去，却能拓宽未来。
author: Paul Boese

txt_en: We have to do the best we are capable of. This is our sacred human responsibility.
txt_cn: 我们必须尽力而为，这是我们生而为人的神圣责任。
author: 阿尔伯特·爱因斯坦

txt_en: The worst loneliness is not to be comfortable with yourself.
txt_cn: 最糟糕的孤独是无法舒适地和自己相处。
author: 马克·吐温

txt_en: That's what I consider true generosity. You give your all, and yet you always feel as if it costs you nothing.
txt_cn: 我认为，真正的慷慨是奉献所有，却仍觉得没有损失分毫。
author: 西蒙娜·德·波伏娃

txt_en: Be as simple as you can be. You'll be astonished to see how uncomplicated and happy your life will be.
txt_cn: 尽量简单做自己，你就会惊奇地发现，生活是如此简单而且快乐。
author: 《乔布斯》

txt_en: Today is your opportunity to build the tomorrow you want.
txt_cn: 想要创造出明天，今天就是你的机会。
author: Ken Poirot

txt_en: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
txt_cn: 相信自己能成功，你就已经成功了一半。
author: Theodore Roosevelt

txt_en: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
txt_cn: 试着去成为别人乌云里的一道彩虹吧！
author: Maya Angelou

txt_en: Change the way you look at things and the things you look at change.
txt_cn: 改变你看待事物的方式，你所看到的事物也会改变。
author: Wayne W. Dyer

txt_en: I have failed many times, and that's why I am a success.
txt_cn: 我失败过很多次，这就是我成功的原因。
author: 迈克尔·乔丹

txt_en: There is an applause superior to that of the multitudes: one's own.
txt_cn: 有一种掌声，比大众的掌声更优裕：那就是你自己给自己鼓的掌。
author: Elizabeth Elton Smith
